sense.def:
The growth of something
je povečanje ali razvoj nečesa po velikosti, bogastvu ali pomenu.

seg.quote: Its economic growth rate is second only to Japan's.

sense.def:
Growth
pri človeku, živali ali rastlini je proces naraščanja velikosti in razvijanja.

seg.quote: He noticed that this drug seemed to inhibit bacterial growth.

sense.def:
A growth
je nenormalna oteklina, ki zraste v telesu človeka, živali ali rastline.
